repo_desc: Embed this widget on your site and help save net neutrality!
DEPRECATED. Simple app that displays contact information for US Congress representatives by district.
Purposefully slows loading of webpages to simulate what the internet would look like without Net Neutrality
(somewhat) cleaned-up notebooks used in researching public comments for FCC Proceeding 17-108 (Net Neutrality Repeal)
The Internet Monitor is a research project to evaluate, describe, and summarize the means, mechanisms, and extent of Internet content controls and Internet activity around the world.
